definition.datasource:
from nxstools.pyeval import minipix ds.result = minipix.triggermode_cb(commonblock, "$(name)", ds.$(name)_triggermode, ds.$(name)_saveallimages, ds.$(name)_framesperfile, ds.$(name)_height, ds.$(name)_width, ds.$(name)_opmode, ds.$(name)_filepostfix, "$(name)_savefilename", "$(name)_framenumbers", "$var.filename", "$var.entryname#'$(__entryname__)'$var.serialno")
$datasources.$(name)_triggermode $datasources.$(name)_opmode $datasources.$(name)_savefilename $datasources.$(name)_saveallimages $datasources.$(name)_framesperfile $datasources.$(name)_framenumbers $datasources.$(name)_filepostfix $datasources.$(name)_height $datasources.$(name)_width
